name: chat-with-aubreypwd
description: An (unofficial) native MacOS App for Chat with @aubreypwd where you can chat with me.

scripts.installsupport: echo 'Run: [brew install graphicsmagick imagemagick] for additional DMG support.'
scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/ && ./node_modules/.bin/create-dmg './build/Chat with @aubreypwd-darwin-x64/Chat with @aubreypwd.app' --overwrite --dmg-title='Chat with @aubreypwd' --identity='Aubrey Portwood' ./dist/ || true && mv './dist/Chat with @aubreypwd 1.0.0.dmg' "./dist/Chat with @aubreypwd $npm_package_version.dmg"

author: Aubrey Portwood
